page.title: 07Life Styles (Gomersal)
page.content: ed detached and semidetached houses and bungalows have mushroomed in Birkenshaw.These houses are mostly brick built but some have Stonefaced fronts and some are pebbledashed. In Hazel Close the bungalows are for senior citizens built in aid of the Flower Fund appeal by Miss Chanter, Mayoress. { Gomersal}is a semi-rural village within easy reach of the cities of Leeds,Bradford and Wakefeild.The motorway network is also very close.The village is quiet because it hasn't any large amenities and there are no big factories to pollute the air.The housing is a mixture of old and new with some houses dating from the 17th century.
